page.title: 01CHILDREN IN CLASS 6. 1985
page.content:
{DANIEL TRUEN My name is Daniel Truen.I am six years old.I am 115 cm tall.I weigh 22 kilos.I have brown hair and blue eyes. I go to Broughton First School.I am in class 6.My group is BLUE.
{CHRISTOPHER BRANDON { }My name is Christopher Brandon.I am five years old.I am 117cm tall.I weigh 23 kilos.I have brown hair and blue eyes.I go to Broughton First School.I am in class 6.My group is GREEN.
{JAMES MILTON { }My name is James Milton.I am five years old.I am 113cm tall.I weigh 22 kilos.I have light brown hair and light brown eyes.I go to Broughton First School.I am in class 6.My group is BLUE.
